dcterms:description: A popular benchmark dataset for evaluating recommendation algorithms. Here, we use the version that includes 100k user ratings.
dcterms:title: Movielens-100k (ML-100k)

dcterms:description: A popular and continuously updated dataset for business recommendation. The version we download for the experiments in this paper is Feb. 16 2021, i.e., all review records are written before Feb. 16 2021.
dcterms:title: Yelp
